abstract: Analysts have been cutting their third-quarter earnings estimates for Goldman Sachs. But two analysts remain very bullish about Goldman’s stock price.
snippet: Analysts have been cutting their third-quarter earnings estimates for Goldman Sachs. But two analysts remain very bullish about Goldman’s stock price.
lead_paragraph: Nelson D. Schwartz, a DealBook colleague, reports:

headline.main: Bearish on Wall Street, Bullish on Goldman
